statements.select: select * from ProduceInDepotDetail where ProduceInDepotId=#value# ORDER BY Inumber ASC

select *,(select CustomerInvoiceXOId from InvoiceXO where InvoiceId=(select InvoiceXOId from PronoteHeader where PronoteHeaderID=ProduceInDepotDetail.PronoteHeaderId)) as InvoiceCusXOId from ProduceInDepotDetail where ProduceInDepotId in(select ProduceInDepotId from ProduceInDepot where ProduceInDepotDate between #startdate# and #enddate#) and (PronoteHeaderId >=#startpronoteid# or #startpronoteid# is null) and (PronoteHeaderId <=#endpronoteid# or #endpronoteid# is null) and (productid=#productid# or #productid# is null) $sql$ order by ProduceInDepotId desc

select * from ProduceInDepotDetail where ProduceInDepotId in(select ProduceInDepotId from ProduceInDepot where (ProduceInDepotDate between #startdate# and #enddate#) and (workhouseId=#workhouseId# or #workhouseId# is null)) and (PronoteHeaderId =#pronoteid# or #pronoteid# is null) and (productid=#productid# or #productid# is null) and ( (#cusxoid# is null ) or (PronoteHeaderId in(select PronoteHeaderId from PronoteHeader where invoicexoid in(select invoiceid from invoicexo where CustomerInvoiceXOId like '%$cusxoid$%')) ) ) order by ProduceInDepotId desc

select isnull(sum(ProceduresSum),0) from ProduceInDepotDetail where (PronoteHeaderId =#PronoteHeaderId# OR #PronoteHeaderId# IS NULL) and ProduceInDepotId IN (SELECT ProduceInDepotId FROM ProduceInDepot WHERE WorkHouseId=#WorkHouseId#) AND ProductId = #ProductId#

select isnull(sum(CheckOutSum),0) from ProduceInDepotDetail where (PronoteHeaderId =#PronoteHeaderId# OR #PronoteHeaderId# IS NULL) and ProduceInDepotId IN (SELECT ProduceInDepotId FROM ProduceInDepot WHERE WorkHouseId=#WorkHouseId#) AND ProductId = #ProductId#

select isnull(sum(ProceduresSum),0) from ProduceInDepotDetail WHERE (PronoteHeaderId=#PronoteHeaderId# or #PronoteHeaderId# is null) AND ProduceInDepotId IN( SELECT ProduceInDepotid FROM ProduceInDepot WHERE ProduceInDepot.ProduceInDepotDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# AND (WorkHouseId=#WorkHouseId# or #WorkHouseId# is null))

select isnull(sum(CheckOutSum),0) from ProduceInDepotDetail WHERE (PronoteHeaderId=#PronoteHeaderId# or #PronoteHeaderId# is null) AND ProduceInDepotId IN( SELECT ProduceInDepotid FROM ProduceInDepot WHERE ProduceInDepot.ProduceInDepotDate BETWEEN #startdate# AND #enddate# AND (WorkHouseId=#WorkHouseId# or #WorkHouseId# is null))
select isnull(sum(ProduceTransferQuantity),0) from ProduceInDepotDetail where WorkHouseId =#WorkHouseId# and PronoteHeaderId=#PronoteHeaderId#
SELECT PronoteHeaderId,SUM(HeJiProceduresSum) AS HeJiProceduresSum FROM ProduceInDepotDetail WHERE PronoteHeaderId IN ($value$) GROUP BY PronoteHeaderId
SELECT d.* FROM ProduceInDepotDetail d LEFT JOIN ProduceInDepot h ON h.ProduceInDepotId = d.ProduceInDepotId WHERE h.WorkHouseId = #WorkHouseid# AND d.PronoteHeaderId = #PronoteHeaderId#
SELECT isnull(SUM(ProceduresSum),0) FROM ProduceInDepotDetail WHERE ProduceInDepotId = #ProduceIndepotId# AND ProductId = #ProductId# AND Inumber < #Inumber#
SELECT isnull(SUM(CheckOutSum),0) FROM ProduceInDepotDetail WHERE ProduceInDepotId = #ProduceIndepotId# AND ProductId = #ProductId# AND Inumber < #Inumber#
